channel.title: Golang on Zack's Notablog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Zack's Notablog

item.title: FIND3
item.description: The Framework for Internal Navigation and Discovery (FIND) is like indoor GPS for your house or business, using only a simple smartphone or laptop. Its an idea I started thinking about 8 years ago and wrote the first code in PHP almost four years ago, dubbed version 0, as a proof-of-concept. Two years later the project was re-written in Python. Then it was re-written in Go and called “FIND”. It’s been ported again to Python and called “whereami”.
